title: What are the letter notes to Carol of the Bells on piano? - Quora

response.answer_text: The letter notes depend on what key you are playing. If, for example, you are playing in the key of G, the notes are G F# G E, repeat 11 times for a total of 12 repeats. Then B A B G, repeat 3 times. Then E E E D C, B B B A G, A A A B A, G F# G E. You can find the sheet music on the internet by searching “piano score Carol of the Bells” [1] Footnotes[1] Traditional "Carol of the Bells" Sheet Music (Easy Piano) (Piano Solo) in E Minor (transposable) - Download & Print
The slow "ding dong ding dong" part that descends below the ostinato (as described by Ronald Isaacson) is "A G F E F E D C". I love this, trying to replicate sheet music one vague answer at a time...
